trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Peekskill
There were no other sightings in Peekskill on or around July 24th 1984
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in front of my house talking to the state trooper that was directing traffic to the annual Italian celebration in Verplanc ny This celebration is always on the third weekend of July it runs only 4 days and only between the hours of 7:oopm to about mid night the days of the feast are thursday friday saturday and sunday with lots of fireworks about midnight It was about 8;30 to 8;45 pm it was dark as I walked to my house no more than 20 feet away from where I wasI just happen to look in the direction of the feast due north from where i was when a long string of lights got my attention i ran inside grabbed my binos 7x50 and ran outside thelights were still coming but very slow as they came right over my head I heard a faint humming sound and the yelling what the hell is it? as I try to look for some structure all I could see was a dark object that was very big moved very slow had a strange humm many big bright white lights that were blinking many small non blinking lights and a very unusual way of turning the huge object was very low and turned without banking which I find strange it made a very sharp U turn right over my head and slowly headed back north north east since there was this rummor going around about Ultralights at first I thought they were Ultralights however after watching the UFO hunters on tv and seing those lights and hearing that strange sound again I believe that what I saw that night was not a group of Ultralights this object must have been 6oo feet wide flew very low and also flew very slow very queit and trailing this object was a strange small blinking red light which had me confused since I could not tell if this light was part of this object or a separate craft my then 10 year old son joshua remembers the trooper complaining about always having a camera in their cars except when you need one today I m convinced that what I saw was the Hudson Valley UFO I m an amateur astronomer and do not believe for one second that we are alone, thank you for listening to my story.
